name: Jim OKelly
bio: Jim has been programming since 1993, when he learned to write C in order to work on an early online type of game known as Multi-User Dungeons or MUDs. From C he went onto learning dynamic languages like LISP and then JavaScript. From there he spent almost 15 years coding for companies all over the world, tackling everything from decoding genomes to auto-trading software. He then discovered his love for teaching and began teaching students from every background, all over the world.
